title: On which George Harrison songs did Paul McCartney play lead guitar? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to the beatlesbible.com, the only George Harrison songs that fit this description are Taxman and Old Brown Shoe. For songs, there were a lot of overdubs, where both George and Paul contributed to lead guitar parts. So, technically, Paul doesn’t have any songs where he was the sole lead guitarist on a song written by George Harrison, but he did have two where he was contributing melodies as a guitarist.
